content:
I'm glad I could help! It's great to hear that you have experience with rural roads and are aware of the potential hazards, such as wildlife and farm animals. It's always important to be mindful of your surroundings and adapt to the terrain and conditions.

That's fantastic that you participated in Pedals for a Purpose and helped raise money for a great cause! Cycling events like that are not only a great way to challenge yourself physically but also to give back to the community. I'm sure it was a rewarding experience, and I'm glad to hear that you're looking forward to this ride as well.

Remember to stay focused, enjoy the scenery, and take in the fresh air. Rural roads can be very peaceful and offer a unique perspective on the countryside. Don't hesitate to stop and take breaks when you need to, and don't forget to rehydrate and refuel regularly.

If you have any more questions or need further advice, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you a safe and enjoyable ride!
